author: damien
msg: Test and fix for infinite loops in view_servers, fix for crashed OS processes causing leaked erlang processes and fix for view server crashing when view group process terminates.

author: dblevins
msg: Moving the tag back to a branch for a patch and respin

author: ebourg
msg: OptionGroup now selects properly an option with no short name (CLI-182)
OptionGroups no longer throw an AlreadySelectedException when reused for several parsings (CLI-183)

author: jwaldman
msg: TRINIDAD-1492 Log error if Application View Cache is on (USE_APPLICATION_VIEW_CACHE is true)
Added a _LOG.severe error in _useApplicationViewCache if it is going to return true.

author: sebb
msg: TestThread booleans need to be volatile to work reliably across threads
Add Throwable field to save errors when they occur
